installAllPackages <- function(Pkgs){
    new.Pkgs <- Pkgs[!(Pkgs %in% installed.packages()[, "Package"])]
    if (length(new.Pkgs)) 
        install.packages(new.Pkgs, dependencies = TRUE)
    null<- sapply(Pkgs, require, character.only = TRUE)
    
}
